title: hmcl启动失败！出现了bug！
author: tian天泽ze
txt_content:
我就装了个forge，1.14.4版本
十二月 22, 2019 10:59:13 上午 org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.CrashReporter lambda$reportToServer$1

严重: Failed to post HMCL server.

java.io.IOException: Invalid Http response

    at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream0(Unknown Source)

    at sun.net.www.protocol.http.HttpURLConnection.getInputStream(Unknown Source)

    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.net.NetUtils.readData(NetUtils.java:104)

    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.net.NetUtils.post(NetUtils.java:98)

    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.net.NetUtils.post(NetUtils.java:80)

    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.net.NetUtils.post(NetUtils.java:76)

    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.net.NetUtils.post(NetUtils.java:72)

    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.CrashReporter.lambda$reportToServer$1(CrashReporter.java:143)

    at org.jackhuang.hmcl.util.CrashReporter$$Lambda$2.run(Unknown Source)

    at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

replies.author: CheatDiamond
replies.txt_content: 把完整崩溃报告拿出来

replies.author: tian天泽ze
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2019-12-22 11:04
更新 hmcl
http://ci.huangyuhui.net/job/HMCL/139/artifact/HMCL/build/libs/HMCL-3.2.139.exe
是游戏启动失败，hmcl可以启动

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
tian天泽ze 发表于 2019-12-22 11:09
是游戏启动失败，hmcl可以启动
你发的是 hmcl 的 log

replies.author: paperspigot
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: 小徐大大QAQ
replies.txt_content: 要不就换个启动器，要不就更新一下HMCL，旧版本的HMCL启动1.14的时候有bug
